name: Chicken Burger
ingredients: Chicken patty, burger bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, mayo, cheese
steps: 1. Grill chicken patty. 2. Toast buns. 3. Assemble with vegetables and sauces.

name: Chicken Roll
ingredients: Chicken strips, paratha, onion, chutney, salad
steps: 1. Cook chicken strips. 2. Warm paratha. 3. Roll with chicken and vegetables.
